problem_text_cn: 如图,P为菱形ABCD的对角线AC上一点,AB=2cm,∠B=120°,PE⊥CD于点E,PF⊥AD于点F,则PE+PF的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, P is a point on the diagonal AC of the diamond ABCD, AB = N_0, ∠B = N_1, PE ⊥ CD at point E, PF ⊥ AD at point F, then the value of PE + PF is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接BD交AC于O,如图所示:∵四边形ABCD是菱形,∠ADC=120°,∴AD=CD,AC⊥BD,OB=OD=\frac{1}{2}BD,∠BAD=60°,∠DAO=30°,∴PF=\frac{1}{2}PA,OD=\frac{1}{2}AD=1,同理:PE=\frac{1}{2}PC,∴PE+PF=\frac{1}{2}(PA+PC)=\frac{1}{2}AC,∵OA=AD•sin30°=√{3},∴PE+PF=\frac{1}{2}AC=OA=√{3},故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查了菱形的性质以及锐角三角函数的运用；熟练掌握菱形的性质进行推理计算是解决问题的关键．
